VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Potatoes?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Potatoes is arc {Barley}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Barley?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Barley is arc {Potatoes}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Barley and Sugarcane in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Barley and Sugarcane is {1044}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Potatoes and Sugarcane in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Potatoes and Sugarcane is {240}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Potatoes?
SC.A: The total flow output from Potatoes is {501}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Barley?
SC.A: The total flow input by Barley is {672}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 426? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {1044} from {Barley} to {Sugarcane}, a flow of {512} from {Sugarcane} to {Barley}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 290? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {240} from {Sugarcane} to {Potatoes}, a flow of {202} from {Barley} to {Potatoes}, a flow of {160} from {Potatoes} to {Barley}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 181 and 426? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {341} from {Potatoes} to {Sugarcane}, a flow of {240} from {Sugarcane} to {Potatoes}, a flow of {202} from {Barley} to {Potatoes}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Barley to Potatoes or from Potatoes to Sugarcane?
NC.A: The flow from {Potatoes} to {Sugarcane} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Sugarcane to Potatoes, from Barley to Potatoes, or from Sugarcane to Barley?
NC.A: The flow from {Sugarcane} to {Barley} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Barley}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Barley} and {Sugarcane}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Potatoes, Arc Sugarcane, Arc Barley}.
